## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G13224](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G13224)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>RBGD3</u>
- **Gene Name:** RNA-binding glycine-rich protein D3
- **Description:**   RNA-binding (RRM/RBD/RNP motifs) family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
